description:
On-premise SDK for connecting applications and databases using Invantive products

Invantive Bridge is an on-premsie SDK that enables your applications and databases to connect using the same technical features as offered by the range of Invantive products. Invantive Bridge provides cloud connectivity as well as an advanced SQL engine and drivers. With Invantive Bridge you can access your cloud and on-premise applications and data from within Microsoft Visual Studio and many others using familiar SQL statements and Microsoft ADO.NET.
